channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Login with Phone Number WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Login with Phone Number WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-23492|2023-01-20T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- login%20with%20phone%20number%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Login with Phone Number WordPress Plugin, version < 1.4.2, is affected by an authenticated SQL injection vulnerability in the 'ID' parameter of its 'lwp_forgot_password' action.
